name: NoLand
description:
Story:

You have died... And now you landed here. It's neither the afterlife, nor it looks like our world... it's something inbetween. Seems like the physical laws here are also different to our, and you by yourself are now an elemental being. Better get away from this place, before it consumes you. Don't stay on the same place for too long...

Controls:

Mouse - Look around

WASD - Move

Left SHIFT - Run

SPACE - Jump
